Welcome to investment-dataset-builder’s documentation!¶

investment-dataset-builder is a Python package that provides a set of tools to build a dataset of financial data for machine learning purposes. It pulls data from the Financial Modelling Prep API and offers a very simple interface to build a dataset of stock information across many exchanges and markets.

Note

This package is maintained and is suitable for use.
